definition: to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
to go/to visit (e.g. another country)/to attend (a banquet etc)

sentences.english: Police then rushed to the scene to sort out the horse and Luo Tuoqing meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 警方隨後趕赴現場將馬和駱駝清理出集會場所。

sentences.english: Who gave me the name of May, to go forward with great strength and vigour of a ceramic rhyme?
sentences.chinese: 是誰賦予我五月的名義，趕赴一場浩浩蕩蕩的瓷韻？

sentences.english: Journalists who were tipped off about the incident raced to the scene.
sentences.chinese: 事先聽到有關此事風聲的新聞記者爭先恐後趕赴現場。

sentences.english: Hundreds of troops have been dispatched to the region to assist in the effort.
sentences.chinese: 數以百計的軍隊已經趕赴災區，幫助救援工作。

sentences.english: International disaster relief teams have been sent to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 國際災難救援隊伍也已經趕赴日本。

sentences.english: Reporters rushed to the scene, the balcony windows billowing smoke wafting account.
sentences.chinese: 記者趕赴現場發現，陽臺窗戶口飄出滾滾黑煙。

sentences.english: Currently, rescue workers rushed to the scene.
sentences.chinese: 目前，救援人員已趕赴現場。

sentences.english: Invitation of the Government of Mexico, Chile, support search and rescue experts to the scene.
sentences.chinese: 應墨西哥政府邀請，智利專家趕赴現場支援搜救。

sentences.english: Senior provincial officials were assigned to direct rescue operations on site.
sentences.chinese: 江西省高層官員趕赴現場指揮搶救。

sentences.english: Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan has been canceled earth day itinerary, will be rushed to the disaster area.
sentences.chinese: 土總理埃爾多安已取消當天的預定行程，將趕赴災區。

sentences.english: But other Turks have reached out to the quake-stricken area.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有的土耳其人還是趕赴災區。

sentences.english: If the doctor had come in time, Bmy would still be alive.
sentences.chinese: 如果大夫實時趕赴艾米此刻還會在世。

sentences.english: Hu Xiadong, deputy minister of railways, is heading to the scene for rescue work.
sentences.chinese: 鐵道部副部長鬍亞東正趕赴現場，指導救援工作。

sentences.english: Guo Gengmao, the provincial governor has gone to the mine to take charge of the rescue operation.
sentences.chinese: 河南省省長郭庚茂已趕赴現場指揮搶險救援。

sentences.english: The 110 command center sent policemen to the site as soon as they received the crime report.
sentences.chinese: 指揮台接警後立刻派民警趕赴出事地點。
